extendedInfo.description: The fairy is out of the soap bubble bath and ready to be matched up in pairsEvery kid love listening to fairy tale stories with beautiful fairies as they just came out of the soap bubble bath and dressed up. Itâs time to live in the fairyworld and play with them in this memory match game to develop their time management skills and improve their memory. It is a free card matching game with the beautiful fairiesthatclimb the hills of fashion and elegance to look like the super stars.Become the super heroes of card matching. The fairies would be loved by kids especially by girls more than any angry creatures, jumping monkeys, birds or any running animals. Track the fairies all the way to the fairy wonderlands and match them up in pairs. Girls are already big fans of Barbie, bubble princess and the fashion make up girls. This is the time you move from those street killer and gunshooting games. Itâs not about killing or racing with any motocars; itâs just about racing with time before it runs out. Save the minds of your little agents. Let them have time management skills. They will improve their memorizing skills in their early preschool days by playing memory match games. Time management games are far better than any cooking or maker games of pancakes or the pizzas. Itâs all about challenging something that might have not been done by any super hero, matching the unmatched cards before the timer runs out.***FEATURES***â Amazing and Challenging Game play.â Three Difficulty levels to challenge your time management skills.â 5 addictive game stages.â Tic-Toc timer to test the speed at which your kids are playing.â Best flipping animations.â Scores at the end telling you how fast did you complete the level. â The faster you complete the rack the more scores you earn.â Animated Splash Screen.â Colorful HD images.â Tic-toc timer sound.All you need to do is match up the cards in pairs. It would be challenging for you to complete the match and advance to the next level which might be even more challenging for you. So pull the trigger andcut the rope to reach the finish line. Match all fairies before the timer runs out. ***DISCLAIMER***â This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen.

reviews.title: Crap malware
reviews.comment: I downloaded this for my daughter. And it down loaded apps onto my phone, with out my permission.
reviews.author: A Google User
